text: Interesting!  I will say, though, that any underwater level from the series is usually among the most atmospheric to me in the series, and Wise usually does those.  Plus, Wise's new soundtrack for the GBA DKC3 made use of field-recording type sounds, which is insanely atmospheric (by default!).

author: CosmicShadowMari0

text: This one's from Fischer, she really has her own unique style and choice of instruments compared to Wise's tracks, it's quite easy to tell. Personally I think Wise generally has the better melodies while Fischer is really good at composing atmospheric tracks that helped define this game's soundtrack. I think her contribution was very important. Just hearing that harp/guitar instrumentï»¿ at the 10 seconds mark, you know it's from Fischer.
